name: Ranger Patrol - Student Project
description:
Ranger Patrol

  • This was  my year 1 student assessment project for games programming.

•My game is a 2D Medieval Shooting Side Scroller. You play as a ranger who is on patrol who gets attacked by a pack of vicious wolves led by a cursed werewolf. In order to make it back alive you have to fight a wave of wolves and then face the werewolf to win.

•Aim of the game is to kill all enemies without getting hit and survive the wave of enemies

  • Final Boss doesn't have any attacks merely a timer to appear and some code to move up and down with the player position.
